title: Ham, Green Bean and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['2 litres water', '900g fully-cooked ham, chopped', '440g fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into 1.75cm pieces', '465g cubed potatoes', '2 onions, sliced', '250ml cream', '1 teaspoon salt or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper or to taste']
